title: The Land owner / Developer may handover the affordable plots to MHADA at one place in lieu of FSI / DR as per TDR regulations to be utilised on the remaining plots
clause_text: The Land owner / Developer may handover the affordable plots to MHADA at one place in lieu of FSI / DR as per TDR regulations to be utilised on the remaining plots. Provided that in case the Landowner / Developer desires not to utilize such additional FSI / DR in the same land, fully or partly, then he shall be awarded TDR in lieu of
section: For the sub-division or layout of the land :-

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
